Value: poki li tawa lon ma ala

jan wile

jan pi musi mani
sina toki e jan pi musi mani "Alesu". ona toki e ni: o kama jo e mani mute mute! o musi e musi mi!
o weka
sina ken weka e mani sina 100%, taso sina ken kama jo e mani ale!
musi li pona la, sina ken kepeken e ilo ante!
poki tawa
